snippet: The federal College Assistance Migrant Program, or CAMP, helps young people from migrant-worker families obtain a higher education, and St. Edward’s University has been involved from the beginning.
lead_paragraph: The federal College Assistance Migrant Program, or CAMP, helps young people from migrant-worker families obtain a higher education, and St. Edward’s University has been involved from the beginning.
